The user spreads sand particles throughout the area, creating a {{translation|sensing barrier|感知結界|kanchi kekkai}} that disrupts the enemies' ability to [[Sensing Technique|sense]] targets. However, the technique appears only able to work on targets focused on.

== Trivia ==
* The name of this technique makes a play on the word {{translation|desert|砂漠|sabaku}}.
